attributes.action: let any member of the public find out the number of sex offenders living in a given locality.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Although we know the government will never provide us with names and addresses of sex offenders, we have a basic human right to be able to assess how safe our families are from sexual predators. We can only do this if we have access to reliable information on the number of offenders living in our village/town/city.
 This could be achieved by allowing people to make enquiries at the local police station, regarding the number of offenders living within that station's jurisdiction.
